[[File:Example of chest film of acute lung oedema.png|vignette|538x538px|Example of chest film of acute lung oedema]]

question.question: What is a common finding on a chest radiograph of a patient with acute pulmonary edema of hemodynamic origin?
question.option_b: Prominent pulmonary vasculature with perihilar haziness
question.option_c: Clear lung fields with no signs of fluid accumulation
question.option_d: Localized consolidation in the lower lobes
